TickerQ `v8.0

Enterprise-grade background task scheduler for .NET reflection-free execution, Entity Framework Core persistence, distributed coordination, and real-time monitoring dashboard.

Get Started
View on GitHub

Minimal Core, Maximum Performance

The core `TickerQ` library is lightweight, reflection-free, and dependency-free—designed to run inside your .NET application with ultra-low overhead and deterministic execution.

EF Core Integration with TickerQ.EntityFramework

Add `TickerQ.EntityFramework` to persist tickers, job states, and execution history in your own database. Built to plug directly into your existing `DbContext` with full support for queries, retries, and cleanup.

Visual Control with TickerQ.Dashboard

Bring visibility to your background processing. The `TickerQ.Dashboard` package provides a ready-to-use, real-time web UI to inspect, manage, and trigger jobs—powered by SignalR and styled with Tailwind.

Advanced Scheduling Engine

Whether it's second-precise `TimeTickers` or flexible `CronTickers`, TickerQ supports both with built-in throttling, cooldown control, and priority-based job queuing.
